verses.roman:
sabāre vasāilā prabhu yogya krama kari'
śrī-haste pariveśana kaila gaurahari

synonyms: sabāre—all the devotees; vasāilā—made to sit; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yogya—befitting; krama—in order, one after another; kari'—setting; śrī-haste—by His own transcendental hand; pariveśana—distribution; kaila—did; gaurahari—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: One after the other, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu made all the devotees sit in their proper places. He then began to distribute prasāda with His own transcendental hand.
